channel.title: Markdown on Eleglite
channel.description: Recent content in Markdown on Eleglite

item.title: Hugo Markdown Demo
item.description: A comprehensive guide demonstrating Markdown syntax and formatting capabilities in Hugo, including basic and advanced features like text formatting, lists, code highlighting, and more.

item.title: Hugo Markdown 中文演示
item.description: 全面指南，展示在 Hugo 中使用 Markdown 语法和格式化功能，包括文本格式化、列表、代码高亮等基础和高级功能。
